attributes.action: curtail the production of bio fuels which utilise cereals and other foods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As global warming is being proved to be a myth as far as carbon emissions is concerned,and that the earth has in actual fact cooled by 0.75 degrees there is no need for bio fuels which could lead to populations in the third world to suffer more starvation than they do already.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
